ComicInfo.Summary:
Better than a dozen roses or a box of chocolates—it’s the February issue of MAD. It may not be romantic, but it’s sure to get some laughs!
Final issue of the original series.
Note: The digital edition for this issue was released before the print edition.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:30:44. [Issue ID 659857]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/mad-550-landmark-final-issue/4000-659857/
